Name: Escape from Fortress Lugohm
About the game: Aisha is a happy-go-lucky thief girl. She was on her way home after having completed a mission from the guild. However, on her way back, she was caught by the infamous Count Lugohm and his guards. What will become of Aisha? Will Aisha be able to escape from the impregnable Fortress Lugohm? Find out in this Stealth Survival RPG brought to you in native English! Features A Stealth Survival RPG Experience Assassination System Multiple Difficulty Levels And Multiple Methods to Escape!
